entry.title: Trump's phone calls alarm US officials

media:group.media:title: Trump's phone calls alarm US officials
media:group.media:description:
In hundreds of highly classified phone calls with foreign heads of state, President Donald Trump was so consistently unprepared for discussion of serious issues, so often outplayed in his conversations with powerful leaders like Russian President Vladimir Putin and Turkish President Recep Erdogan, and so abusive to leaders of America's principal allies, that the calls helped convince some senior US officials -- including his former secretaries of state and defense, two national security advisers and his longest-serving chief of staff -- that the President himself posed a danger to the national security of the United States, according to White House and intelligence officials intimately familiar with the contents of the conversations.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Trump's press secretary claims he wasn't briefed on Russia bounty intel

media:group.media:title: Trump's press secretary claims he wasn't briefed on Russia bounty intel
media:group.media:description:
White House press secretary Kayleigh McEnany says that President Trump was not briefed on US intelligence reports that Russia put bounties on US troops in Afghanistan.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Couple pulls weapons on protesters cutting through their private street

media:group.media:title: Couple pulls weapons on protesters cutting through their private street
media:group.media:description:
Protesters in St. Louis were walking on a private street when two armed individuals came out of a home brandishing weapons. The couple says their lives were threatened.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Maps show explosive growth of coronavirus in US

media:group.media:title: Maps show explosive growth of coronavirus in US
media:group.media:description:
Covid-19 cases in the United States are surging and numerous states are now pausing or rolling back their re-openings.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Hear why Roberts sided with liberals on Supreme Court abortion ruling

media:group.media:title: Hear why Roberts sided with liberals on Supreme Court abortion ruling
media:group.media:description:
CNN 's Jessica Schneider and chief legal analyst Jeffrey Toobin break down the Supreme Court decision to block a Louisiana abortion law and why Chief Justice John Roberts sided with the liberal justices.
#CNN #News

entry.title: See inside a Houston hospital on the front line against coronavirus

media:group.media:title: See inside a Houston hospital on the front line against coronavirus
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Miguel Marquez speaks to doctors and coronavirus patients inside a Houston hospital amid a global pandemic.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Fauci: Vaccine might not get US sufficient level of immunity

media:group.media:title: Fauci: Vaccine might not get US sufficient level of immunity
media:group.media:description:
Dr. Anthony Fauci says he would "settle" for a Covid-19 vaccine that's 70% to 75% effective, but that this incomplete protection, coupled with the fact that many Americans say they won't get a coronavirus vaccine, makes it "unlikely" that the US will achieve sufficient levels of immunity to quell the outbreak.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Fareed Zakaria: China has adopted a confrontational foreign policy

media:group.media:title: Fareed Zakaria: China has adopted a confrontational foreign policy
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Fareed Zakaria examines the world's response to the coronavirus pandemic and how China's foreign policy is using that to its advantage.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Bolton: Trump's 'fundamental focus' not on US national security

media:group.media:title: Bolton: Trump's 'fundamental focus' not on US national security
media:group.media:description:
Former White House national security adviser John Bolton says that President Donald Trump's denial on receiving a briefing about intelligence that Russians had tried to bribe Taliban fighters to kill US troops, shows that his "fundamental focus" is not on national security.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Biden widens lead over Trump in national polls

media:group.media:title: Biden widens lead over Trump in national polls
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Manu Raju breaks down the lead Joe Biden has over President Trump in the latest national polls.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Why Harriet Tubman isn't on the $20 bill yet

media:group.media:title: Why Harriet Tubman isn't on the $20 bill yet
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Laura Coates explains why anti-slavery icon Harriet Tubman has yet to replace former President Andrew Jackson as the face of the $20 bill.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Russia offered cash rewards to Taliban fighters to kill US troops in Afghanistan

media:group.media:title: Russia offered cash rewards to Taliban fighters to kill US troops in Afghanistan
media:group.media:description:
Russian intelligence officers for the military intelligence GRU recently offered money to Taliban militants in Afghanistan as rewards if they killed US or UK troops there, a European intelligence official told CNN.
The official was unclear as to the precise Russian motivation, but said the incentives had, in their assessment, led to coalition casualties. The official did not specify as to the date of the casualties, their number or nationality, or whether these were fatalities or injuries. #CNN #News

entry.title: Bob Costas weighs in on what professional sporting events will look like in the coronavirus era

media:group.media:title: Bob Costas weighs in on what professional sporting events will look like in the coronavirus era
media:group.media:description:
The coronavirus pandemic is forcing professional sports leagues to have abbreviated seasons with no fans in the stands. CNN's Michael Smerconish and award-winning broadcaster Bob Costas discuss what the games will look and sound like.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Smerconish: Confederate statues should remain in Gettysburg. Here's why

media:group.media:title: Smerconish: Confederate statues should remain in Gettysburg. Here's why
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Michael Smerconish visits Gettysburg National Military Park Museum and explains why he thinks Confederate statues should remain in certain locations.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Sanjay Gupta: I'm concerned because it feels like we've given up at this point

media:group.media:title: Sanjay Gupta: I'm concerned because it feels like we've given up at this point
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Chris Cuomo and Dr. Sanjay Gupta discuss the coronavirus pandemic as the number of cases in the United States continues to rise.
